( C ) The <extra_id_0> IkappaB-alpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> content was analysed by 12 % SDS-PAGE and western blotting of cytosolic extracts ( 20 microg ) using anti-IkappaB-alpha antibody .
